name: Lightlife
description:
Groping in the dark

with his little spark

our hero wants to find his path

But be careful little mage

your enemies are full of rage

they hunt you down so take no break

Your light is bright

so keep it alive

otherwise you will face the afterlife

Rules:

  • hit the light orb to keep it alive
  • hit the ghosts with the light orb before they hit you
  • unlock and use your abilities
  • level up your light orb by hitting it

Controls:

  • ‘Space’ to hit the light orb
  • ‘Shift’ to dash through ghosts (unlock first)
  • ‘E’ to drag the light orb to your position (unlock first)
  • ‘R’ to activate chain light orb (unlock first)

Used tools:

  • Unity3D 2019.3.7f1
  • Blender
  • Gimp
  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/de/black-chancery.font
